document_data.mainbody:
ucky Aello was a rather unscrupulous shopkeeper and the proprietor of Lucky Aellos Discount Store in Baldurs Gate during the midâ€“14 century DR.
Aello sold a number of cursed items from his shop, found on the eastern side of the Lower City of Baldurs Gate. He primarily dealt in scrolls and potions, but also managed to get his hands on some, less-than-useful magical weapons.
